description: ServCorp gives you access to fully furni
overview: ServCorp gives you access to fully furnish and flexible serviced and virtual office solutions. Our serviced Offices are premium managed, furnished office suites in a CBD location and includes receptionist services, boardrooms, superior technology with support services. Our Virtual Offices gives you a phone number with dedicated receptionist, a prime CBD address and facilities for your meetings without the overheads of a physical office allowing you to run your business efficiently. We pride ourselves on being the innovators in the serviced office and virtual office industry by developing technology driven solutions that benefit your business. Our overriding aim is to give you more time and money to spend on your business.
